member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.CacheKey.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.param: value of the headers as in the request. Only those values whose named defined in VaryByHeader must be passed

member.name: T:CacheCow.Common.CacheValidationStatus
member.summary: Status of cache validation required for a request

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.Helpers.HttpHeadersExtensions.Parse(System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpHeaders,System.String)
member.param: CR-LF separated headers as specified in HTTP spec

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.Helpers.HttpHeadersExtensions.ExtractHeadersValues(System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders,System.String[])
member.summary: Extracts all headers provided. Does a case-insensitive selection.

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.ICacheStore.GetValueAsync(CacheCow.Common.CacheKey)
member.summary: Gets the cached HTTP-Response from this storage
member.returns: The ResponseMessage if the key was found; null otherwise

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.ICacheStore.AddOrUpdateAsync(CacheCow.Common.CacheKey,System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Adds the given response to the chachestore. If the key is already present, the old value is overwrittn

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.ICacheStore.TryRemoveAsync(CacheCow.Common.CacheKey)
member.summary: (Tries to) remove the cached response correspondig with this key from the cache.
member.returns: True if deletion was successfull, False if not (e.g. the key was not in the store to begin with)
